predicate.note: Frames file for 'decamp' based on ECTB 2. No Verbnet entry. Compare to verbs of departure; 'depart', 'escape', 'leave'.

roleset.name: to leave (camp or more generic place)

example.name: destination only
example.text: In 1950, only shortyly afer the central government had decamped to Taipei, it banned the use of Japanese in Taiwan and took a series of measures *0* *T* to erase the Japanese influence on Taiwanese culture.
